Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo threw down a hellacious one-handed slam in transition
AJ Johnson used his electric speed to create an advantage for his team and then maintained it by slowing down and making the right pass to Portis
Pre-Game Insights: Bucks coach Doc Rivers found himself pleased with the effort level throughout the entire game
Rivers emphasized that AJ Johnson received a lot of instruction over the last few days and there is a lot of belief in him throughout the organization
Post-Match Reflections: Giannis Antetokounmpo looked like the player who has dominated the NBA for most of the last decade and has finished in the top 5 of NBA MVP voting for the last six seasons
Rivers said he thought the game was played with some intensity and that was nice to see
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bobby Portis shot the ball with confidence and played with the swagger that has made him a dangerous scorer off the bench for years
AJ Johnson struggled to find the right tempo against the Pistons but against the Lakers he perfectly used his electric speed
Others: Giannis Antetokounmpo gave up his body and crashed to the floor after a chase-down block on Lakers superstar LeBron James
Bobby Portis made his first four 3-point attempts in the game
